html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1994-14241994-08-300,  ,  CITIZENSHIP,  , 
PrecisAmendment to the IMMIGRATION REGULATIONS, 1978 adding a "handicap benefit" under the Assured Income for the Severely Handicapped Act, a "social allowance" under the Social Development Act and an "assistance" under the Students Finance Regulation, to the list of prescribed payments specified in Schedule VI which a province (Alberta) may seek to recover where the payment was necessitated by a breach of the sponsorship agreement.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1994-0578 Publication Date: 1994-09-21
Attachments
